title: Preparation of visible-light active MOFs-Perovskites (ZIF-67/LaFeO<sub>3</sub>) nanocatalysts for exceptional CO<sub>2</sub> conversion, organic pollutants and antibiotics degradation
content:
Publication date: 15 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 5

Author(s): Aftab Khan, Samreen Sadiq, Iltaf Khan, Muhammad Humayun, Guo Jiyuan, Muhammad Usman, Abbas Khan, Shoaib Khan, Amal Faleh Alanazi, Mohamed Bououdina
